backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing a token burn and claim system with functions to record burn events, manage Disintegrate token balances, and query burn history with various sorting and filtering options.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining the actor state structure (burnEvents and balances maps) with a run function that currently performs no-op migration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: wallet interface for dual token display, React Query hook for ICP balance fetching, and token interaction restrictions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files including components (WalletInterface, BurnInterface, BurnHistory, Layout), hooks (useQueries, useClaimTokens, useBurnTransaction), and styling configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a cyberpunk color palette using OKLCH color space for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Disintegrate DeFi Protocol application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component wrapping the app with ThemeProvider, InternetIdentityProvider, and Layout, rendering WalletInterface, BurnInterface, BurnHistory, and Toaster components.
frontend/src/components/BurnAnimation.ts: Animated visualization component displaying ICP burn icon with particle effects, glow rings, and pulsing animations when burn operations are active.
frontend/src/components/BurnHistory.tsx: Table component displaying burn transaction history with timestamps, ICP amounts, and Disintegrate tokens earned, including total summaries for both token types.
frontend/src/components/BurnInterface.ts: Primary burn interface with ICP address display and copy functionality, amount input field, and burn button that triggers token claiming with authentication checks.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with cyberpunk-themed header, footer, and animated background featuring gradient overlays, grid patterns, and a flame logo. Wraps all page content with consistent branding and styling.
frontend/src/components/TokenBalanceDisp: Displays user's Disintegrate token balance with login prompt if unauthenticated. Shows formatted DIS balance earned from burning ICP (1:1 ratio) with loading states and informational messages.
Wallet component displaying both ICP and Disintegrate token balances with login gate. Formats and shows balances in separate cards with loading states and cyberpunk styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state. Automatically invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBurnTransaction.ts: Empty file placeholder for burn transaction hook functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useClaimTokens.ts: Hook for claiming Disintegrate tokens after burning ICP. Manages claim transaction state, calls backend actor, and invalidates relevant queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Comprehensive Internet Identity authentication provider and hook using AuthClient. Manages login flow, identity persistence, and authentication state with React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching burn history, Disintegrate token balance, and ICP balance from the backend actor. All queries depend on authenticated actor availability.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles with Tailwind CSS, custom cyberpunk color palette using OKLCH, glow effects, animations, and typography using Orbitron and Rajdhani fonts. Defines light and dark theme variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component into the DOM.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file that defines custom color schemes using OKLCH color space (including cyber-themed colors), extended theme settings for containers, border radius, shadows, and font families. Includes plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for Disintegrate DeFi Protocol, tracking implemented features (wallet interface with ICP/Disintegrate token balances, React Query hooks) and pending feature requests (wallet integration and ICP balance backend query). Indicates this is a DeFi protocol for burning ICP tokens with burn history and token claiming capabilities.
